text: Daira Mahram railway station () is a disused railway station located in Daira Mahram village, Punjab, Pakistan. The station is located between Abdul Hakim railway station and Darkhana railway station. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Khanewal District Category:Railway stations on Khanewal–Wazirabad Line Category:Defunct railway stations in Pakistan
title: Daira Mahram railway station
